parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To read, know again, know certainly, recognize, discern. From ana and ginosko; to know again, i.e. to read.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.
David, King of Israel. Of Hebrew origin; Dabid, the Israelite king.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be hungry, needy, desire earnestly. From the same as penes; to famish; figuratively, to crave.
